issue.title: System plugin loading issue since gazebo-current 2.2.2-1~precise

content.raw:
Thanks for the hint.

Your suggestion works for the server plugin (I register the event in Load() [Init() does not work, I guess because the world is already created at that point in time] and do my initialization in the callback).
However, it does **not** work for the gui plugin because there is no such signal (which kind of makes sense, since the world is created before the gui). As a kind of workaround I use gui::Events::ConnectModelUpdate(), do my initialization on first callback and disconnect the signal.

On my part the bug can be closed with the conclusion:
Use `event::Events::ConnectWorldCreated()` for system plugin and do the `gui::Events::ConnectModelUpdate()` trick for gui plugins.
